TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAttribute extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an attribute that is associated with the subject of a .

span.span: Represents an attribute that is associated with the subject of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于 OASIS SAML 1.1 规范中定义的 `` XML 元素。The class corresponds to the `` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification. 实例包含 的主题的 声明。A instance contains claims for the subject of a . 例如， 可能包含一个 `Over21` 声明，其类型在 属性中指定，其资源作为集合的成员在 属性中指定。For example, a might contain an `Over21` claim, whose type would be specified in the property and whose resource would be specified as a member of the collection in the property. 调用 方法时，此 `Over21` 声明被添加到由 返回的授权策略中。When the method is called, this `Over21` claim is added to the authorization policy that is returned by returned from by the . 如果 属性包含多个元素，则为每一个元素返回一个声明。When the property contains multiple elements then one claim is returned for each element. 在 SAML 对象层次结构中的位置是： position in the SAML object hierarchy is: ## Examples [!code-csharp[SamlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/samlattribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SamlAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/samlattribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数将声明转换为 SAML 属性。Use this constructor to convert a claim into a SAML attribute. 若要转换为 SAML 属性 (attribute)， 属性 (property) 必须为 ， 属性 (property) 的类型必须为 ，并且 属性 (property) 的格式必须为 `namespace/name`。To be converted to a SAML attribute, the property must be , the property must be of type , and the property must be in the format `namespace/name`. 下表指定 `claim` 参数如何设置 、 和 属性。The following table specifies what the `claim` parameter sets the , , and the properties to. |属性Property|用于设置属性的 `claim` 参数的属性Property of the `claim` parameter used to set the property| |--------------|----------------------------------------------------------------| ||添加到集合中的 属性的值。The value of the property is added to the collection.| || 属性中字符串的最后一个“/”字符之后的部分。The portion of the string after the last '/' character in the property.| || 属性中字符串的最后一个“/”字符之前的部分。The portion of the string before the last '/' character in the property.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定有关该安全令牌所表示的主题的属性。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions that can specify an attribute about the subject represented by the security token. 使用 方法将 SAML 属性转换为一组声明。Use the method to convert the SAML attribute into a set of claims.
